en.title: Test test test FusionExcel Achievers Recognition Dinner, Jakarta, 09th September 2009!
en.content:
REPORT BY INDONESIA COUNTRY LICENSEE’S PARTNER MR J. M. ANOWAR.

FusionExcel's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner held at Ciputra Hotel Jakarta on 09th September 2009 was a great success attended by many quality FE Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. Also attending was FE's Founder CEO Mr. Paul Ting together with Presidential Directors Sam Ho, Stanley Liew, Susanto, Willy Toh and FusionExcel Consultant Master Yap. It was fantastic to note that 90% who attended were new members. 

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Welcome Speech by FusionExcel's Indonesian Country Licensee partner S Prabah.
   
- Opening Speech by FusionExcel's Founder CEO Mr. Paul Ting.
   
- Motivational speech by Presidential Director Sam Ho who brought the roof down with our battle cry Ahoo!Ahoo! Ahoo!
   
- Motivational speech by new Presidential Director Susanto.
   
- Interactive “on stage talk show” with FusionExcel Spokespersons Candra Wijaya (World Doubles Badminton Champion), moderated by well known TV presenter and talk show host Ferly Junandar.
   
- Product demo by FusionExcel Consultant Master Yap. All first timers were very impressed by the power of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant! Followed by on the floor demos by FE Leaders for every table.
   
- Recognition Awards by Mr. Paul Ting to new Presidential Director Susanto and new Directors Darson, Tjong King, Yung and Nancy (Note that for July and August there were 19 new Directors and 1 Presidential Director.
   
- Songs by our resident singer/band, guests and Sofia.
   
- Lucky Draws for Early Birds and Event Closing.

Congratulations also to Presidential Director Susanto who in the same morning opened his Service Centre officiated by Mr. Paul Ting.

A BIG THANK YOU to FE's Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjadja and his team Prabah, Irene, Anowar and supporting staff for organizing the successful event. A BIG THANK YOU also to Ferly Junandar who did a great MC job and to all FE Leaders for supporting the event. See you at the top. 

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!

meta.description: FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner held at Ciputra Hotel Jakarta
meta.author: klhunter
